name: Spots Import/Export
author: Ben Lobaugh w/freshmuse

sections.description:
This plugin adds an Import/Export option to the Spots menu that allows you to
easily export Spots to a CSV file, and import them on another Spots enabled site
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
• 0.7.1 =
  • Update attribution. Plugin was created by Ben Lobaugh while working at freshmuse. Freshmuse was a Seattle WordPress boutique shop

0.7

  • Verified with latest Spots and WP 4.4

0.6

  • Initial release of the plugin
